page.title: 10CARMARTHEN SHOPPING 1985
page.content:
What improvement or new feature would you most like to see? More parking areas,more modern shops,better bus depot,Mothercare and a better sport complex.Will you stay in town for a meal today? 52% said yes and 47% said yes.Will you have something to drink? 26% had tea ,21%coffee, 13% had soft drinks and 20% had nothing. The last question was would you like to see Sunday shopping increasing?56% said no and 44% said yes.All of us enjoyed doing that and we found that 66% were willing, 31% were in a rush and 3% would not answer.
.
